00015 //
00016 // 
00017 // File:        Fluide_Ostwald.cpp
00018 // Directory:   $TRUST_ROOT/src/ThHyd/Incompressible/Milieu
00019 // Version:     /main/16
00020 // 
00021 //
00022 // Nouveau fluide. c'est un fluide incompressible non newtonien. Il derive donc
00023 // de fluide_Incompressible et possede quelques proprietes de plus (K, N)
00024 // mu depend de K, N, et de grad(U)
00025 
00026 #include <Fluide_Ostwald.h>
00027 #include <Probleme_base.h>
00028 #include <Discret_Thyd.h>
00029 #include <Equation_base.h>
00030 #include <Navier_Stokes_std.h>
00031 #include <Param.h>
00032 
00033 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur(Fluide_Ostwald,"Fluide_Ostwald",Fluide_Incompressible);
00034 // XD fluide_ostwald fluide_incompressible fluide_ostwald -1 Non-Newtonian fluids governed by Ostwald\'s law. The law applicable to stress tensor is: NL2 tau=K(T)*(D:D/2)**((n-1)/2)*D Where: NL2 D refers to the deformation tensor NL2 K refers to fluid consistency (may be a function of the temperature T) NL2 n refers to the fluid structure index n=1 for a Newtonian fluid, n<1 for a rheofluidifier fluid, n>1 for a rheothickening fluid.
00035 // XD attr k field_base k 1 Fluid consistency.
00036 // XD attr n field_base n 1 Fluid structure index.
00037 
00038 Fluide_Ostwald::Fluide_Ostwald() { }
00039 
00040 Sortie& Fluide_Ostwald::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00041 {
00042   s<<"{"<<finl;
00043   s<<"K"<<K_<<finl;
00044 // s<<"beta_co"<<beta_co<<finl;
00045   s<<"N"<<N_<<finl;
00046   Milieu_base::ecrire(s);
00047   s<<"}"<<finl;
00048   return s;
00049 }
00050 
00051 Entree& Fluide_Ostwald::readOn(Entree& is)
00052 {
00053   Fluide_Incompressible::readOn(is);
00054   return is;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void Fluide_Ostwald::set_param(Param& param)
00058 {
00059   Fluide_Incompressible::set_param(param);
00060   param.ajouter_condition("is_read_rho","Density rho has not been read for a Fluide_Ostwald type medium.");
00061   param.ajouter("K",&K_,Param::REQUIRED);
00062   param.ajouter("n",&N_,Param::REQUIRED);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void  Fluide_Ostwald::discretiser(const Probleme_base& pb, const  Discretisation_base& dis)
00066 {
00067   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis=pb.equation(0).zone_dis();
00068   const Discret_Thyd& dis2=ref_cast(Discret_Thyd, dis);
00069 
00070 // avec la signature de Ostwald....
00071   const Navier_Stokes_std& eqn_hydr=ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,pb.equation(0));
00072   dis2.proprietes_physiques_fluide_Ostwald(eqn_hydr.zone_dis(),(*this),eqn_hydr,eqn_hydr.inconnue());
00073   Champ_Don& K = consistance();
00074   if (K.non_nul())
00075     {
00076       dis.nommer_completer_champ_physique(zone_dis,"consistance","kg/m/s",K.valeur(),pb);
00077       champs_compris_.ajoute_champ(K.valeur());
00078     }
00079 
00080   Fluide_Incompressible::discretiser(pb,dis);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void Fluide_Ostwald::creer_champs_non_lus()
00084 {
00085   Milieu_base::creer_champs_non_lus();
00086 }
00087 
00088 void Fluide_Ostwald::mettre_a_jour(double tps)
00089 {
00090   K_.mettre_a_jour(tps);
00091   if (N_.non_nul() )
00092     N_.mettre_a_jour(tps);
00093   Fluide_Incompressible::mettre_a_jour(tps);
00094 }
00095 
00096 int Fluide_Ostwald::initialiser(const double& temps)
00097 {
00098   return Fluide_Incompressible::initialiser(temps);
00099 }
